mapper.select: select * from user_table where user_id = ( select user_id from plan_order where order_no = #{orderNo} )

SELECT pt.plan_name, po.join_category, po.sim_type, po.sim_yn, po.current_telecom ,po.plan_bill, po.plan_pay ,pc.card_number, pc.card_expiration, pc.card_holder, pc.card_ssn, pc.card_relationship ,pa.acc_bank, pa.acc_number, pa.acc_holder, pa.acc_ssn, pa.acc_relationship ,po.order_date ,pt.net_no, pt.gen_no, pt.plan_price, pt.plan_data, pt.plan_voice, pt.plan_message, po.order_no, po.order_status FROM plan_order po JOIN plan_table pt ON po.plan_no = pt.plan_no LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYINFO_CARD pc ON po.order_no = pc.order_no LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYINFO_ACC pa ON po.order_no = pa.order_no WHERE po.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT rownum, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(order_no, 6, '0') AS serial_no, plan_name, user_id, order_status, order_date, order_no FROM plan_order JOIN plan_table USING (plan_no) WHERE plan_no IN ( SELECT plan_no FROM plan_table WHERE biz_name LIKE ( SELECT biz_name FROM biz WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} ) )
SELECT count(*) listCnt FROM plan_order JOIN plan_table USING (plan_no) WHERE plan_no IN ( SELECT plan_no FROM plan_table WHERE biz_name LIKE ( SELECT biz_name FROM biz WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} ) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(order_no, 6, '0') AS serial_no, plan_name, user_id, order_status, order_date, order_no FROM plan_order JOIN plan_table USING (plan_no) WHERE plan_no IN ( SELECT plan_no FROM plan_table WHERE biz_name LIKE ( SELECT biz_name FROM biz WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} ) ) ) WHERE rn between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) searchCnt from ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(order_no, 6, '0') AS serial_no, plan_name, user_id, order_status, order_date, order_no FROM plan_order JOIN plan_table USING (plan_no) WHERE plan_no IN ( SELECT plan_no FROM plan_table WHERE biz_name LIKE ( SELECT biz_name FROM biz WHERE biz_id = #{bizid} ) )
AND plan_name like ('%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND user_id like ('%' || #{keyword} || '%')
) )

select biz_id, user_id, p.plan_no , (select pt.plan_name from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_name , (select pt.plan_data from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_data , (select pt.net_no from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as net_no , (select pt.gen_no from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as gen_no from plan_order P where P.user_id=#{userId} and P.order_status=2 and biz_id not in (select biz_id from biz_review where user_id=#{userId})
select count(*) from plan_order P where P.user_id=#{userId} and P.order_status=2 and biz_id not in (select biz_id from biz_review where user_id=#{userId})

select biz_id, user_id, p.plan_no, p.order_no , (select pt.plan_name from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_name , (select pt.plan_data from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_data , (select pt.net_no from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as net_no , (select pt.gen_no from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as gen_no from plan_order P where P.user_id=#{userId}

select p.order_no, p.biz_id, p.plan_no, p.join_category, p.sim_type, p.sim_yn, p.current_telecom, p.plan_bill , p.plan_pay, p.order_date, p.order_status, p.net_no, p.gen_no , (select pc.card_holder from payinfo_card pc where pc.order_no = p.order_no) as card_holder , (select pc.card_ssn from payinfo_card pc where pc.order_no = p.order_no) as card_ssn , (select pc.card_relationship from payinfo_card pc where pc.order_no = p.order_no) as card_relationship , (select pc.card_number from payinfo_card pc where pc.order_no = p.order_no) as card_number , (select pc.card_expiration from payinfo_card pc where pc.order_no = p.order_no) as card_expiration , (select pa.acc_holder from payinfo_acc pa where pa.order_no = p.order_no) as acc_holder , (select pa.acc_ssn from payinfo_acc pa where pa.order_no = p.order_no) as acc_ssn , (select pa.acc_relationship from payinfo_acc pa where pa.order_no = p.order_no) as acc_relationship , (select pa.acc_number from payinfo_acc pa where pa.order_no = p.order_no) as acc_number , (select pa.acc_bank from payinfo_acc pa where pa.order_no = p.order_no) as acc_bank , (select pt.plan_price from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_price , (select pt.plan_data from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_data , (select pt.plan_voice from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_voice , (select pt.plan_message from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_message , (select pt.plan_name from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_name , (select pt.plan_data_over from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_data_over , (select pt.plan_voice_over from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_voice_over , (select pt.plan_message_over from plan_table Pt where pt.plan_no = p.plan_no) as plan_message_over from plan_order P where P.user_id=#{userId} and P.order_no=#{orderNo}
